metadata.name: PUA - AdvancedRun Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utility

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('advancedrun.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /exefilename ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /run')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /windowstate 0')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /runas ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' /commandline ')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utility
